measured_by: wSamplingBias parameter (intercept) in the weighted-evidence model estimated from the expanded judgement task
justification: "The sampling bias, wSamplingBias, is a constant term that accounts for the baseline sampling policy of the observer … this parameter corresponds to the intercept, or height of the decision bound in sequential sampling models."

measured_by: wUrgency parameter (slope) in the weighted-evidence model estimated from the expanded judgement task
justification: "The weight of time, wUrgency, accounts for the sense of urgency … it can also be considered as the slope of the decision bound."
